metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30775 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: xpdf 4.04 allocates excessive memory when presented with crafted input.This can be triggered by (for example) sending a crafted PDF document tothe pdftoppm binary. It is most easily reproduced with theDCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=afl-clang-fast++ option.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
